data.title: California State University, San Bernardino
data.meta_description: We welcome you to be part of the #Coyote4Life family! Get the information you need to Join the Pack – Schedule a campus tour, explore our degree offerings and learn why CSUSB

Coyote Stories

Erin Hall, assistant professor of linguistics and speech-language pathology

- Erin Hall, Ph.D., M.A., MSc

Alumna of the cybersecurity program, Danielle Nodine '19 strives to work hard and take every opportunity she can to accomplish something great.

- Danielle Nodine

As a first-generation college student, alumnus Antonio Quezada '21 strives to pave the way for not only his siblings, but also for future generations in his family.

- Antonio Quezada

Alumna Leanne Tortez '13 of the Diegueño tribe says attending CSUSB was one of the best choices she has ever made.

- Leanne Tortez, '13
